description:

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5653070/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/http/sniff.go
File src/pkg/net/http/sniff.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5653070/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/http/sniff.go#newcode13
src/pkg/net/http/sniff.go:13: // References in this file refer to this draft specification:
this comment is redundant now.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5653070/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/http/sniff.go#newcode23
src/pkg/net/http/sniff.go:23: // a valid MIME type: if it cannot determine a specific one, it
s/specific/more &/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1e1ac2e74216 ***

Fixes issue 2365.
